import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Table from '../components/table/Table' import '../components/topnav/topnav.css' //import companyList from '../assets/JsonData/company-list.json' import axios from 'axios' const companyTableHead = [ 'name', 'email', 'phone', 'cin', 'gstin', 'location' ] const renderHead = (item, index) => {item} const renderBody = (item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.email} {item.phone} {item.cin} {item.gstin} {item.location} ) const Companies = () => { const [companyList, setCompanyList] = useState([]) function getCompany(){ axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/companies') .then((response) => response.data) .then((data) => { setCompanyList(data) }) } useEffect(() => { getCompany() }, []) return (

companies

renderHead(item, index)} bodyData={companyList} renderBody={(item, index) => renderBody(item, index)} /> ) } export default Companies
